item.title: Set Photo Download Resolution
item.description: Defines photo size downloaded. If you have a slow internet connection, it's recommended to decrease this setting.

item.title: Set Slideshow Delay
item.description: This setting defines the length of delay between photos during your slideshow.

item.title: Link additional Google Photos account
item.description: Link an additional Google Photos account to this Roku device. There is no limit on the number of accounts you can link.

item.title: Remove account link from device
item.description: Remove Google Photos account link from this device

item.title: About
item.description: The PhotoView for Google Photos Channel, current version.... BLAH BLAH
